page.title: 03 CHRIST CHURCH
page.content: { Christ Church}is our local church .It has a vicar called{Rev}Thompson,who has a joint appointment; he only works half a week because the other half he works at the{Royal Philanthropic} The church has three leaders who lead services and preach. It has a Parochial Council which gets elected and decides new changes and how to spend the money. It has two{church {wardens}and two{deputy wardens} and sixteen{sides people.}Other people at the church are the{choir, the {organist, the bellringers, a music {group, lesson readers}and{prayer {leaders.}The church also has organizations-{Cradle Roll}0-4, {Climbers}4-6,{Explorers}7-10, and {Pathfinders}11-14. Each meet on Sunday.There is also{SNYF=South {Nutfield Youth Fellowship}.The adults have{house groups. }
